title: Ukraine wakes to possible pause in Russian energy strikes after Trump call
summary_full: Trump asked Putin to hold off hitting Ukraine’s power facilities. Zelensky said if Russia followed through, he would pause strikes on Russia’s energy industry.
summary_public: Trump asked Putin to hold off hitting Ukraine’s power facilities. Zelensky said if Russia followed through, he would pause strikes on Russia’s energy industry.

RU.label: neutral
RU.evidence: possible pause in Russian energy strikes

UA.label: neutral
